allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\Users\kjfle\ml_batch_results'' -File | Select-Object Name, Length, LastWriteTime | Format-Table -AutoSize | Out-String -Width 200")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-Content ''C:\Users\kjfle\ml_batch_results\batch_results.json'' | ConvertFrom-Json | Select-Object total_files, successful, failed, @{Name=''success_rate'';Expression={''{0:P1}'' -f ($_successful/$_total_files)}} | Format-List")
